title: Side Effects of Being a Realist
description:
Are you a pessimist? Or are you simply objective? This week we go to a whole new level of real and get in the mindset of folks who see through the lens of logic, explore how to be the “truth teller friend”, and how to awaken the inner realist in you! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
